page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Of the small number of residents in the area only about half are of em- ployment age. The majority work in farming and very few are employed by the chemical works. The large number of people employed by the industry and in the trading estates come from outside this area. ENERGY Electricity is supplied by the South West Electricity Board and the large number of pylons stretching through Severnside connect to the Berkeley Power Station. South West Gas has a non-working site in this area and is a branch of British Gas which pipes and stores natural gas through the village of Hallen. There are also petrol storage tanks and a pumping station in the vicinity.
